column5: First Toonie Tournament of the year this Sunday on Bellwood Lake 7:00 am - 3:00 pm.  Everyone welcome. We're targeting Pike.  Recommend Photo, Measure and Release. Hope to see you there.  Just bring a Toonie and an attitude to have a good time!  Canadian Toonie Tournament Series
to bad i'll be in Buckhorn this long weekend but i will be there on the 25th of May for the derby
Will see you there Roger, looking forward to another great season.  Nobody else interested from here?  Open to anyone that wishes to attend!
sounds like fun, but I will be up north!  Good luck to all who show up though
....I'm very interested in attending one or two of the "Toonie Tournaments" but it won't be this one. Best O luck to all who do attend.

Would love to be there for it, but I am sure it's too far away?  Noticed that you have a tourney at Weslemekoon Lake for the Canada Day weekend.  It says invitational, what exactly does this mean?  I am interestted in this as I will be right there that weekend.
